question: A friend of yours is going on holiday soon and has asked you to recommend a destination. Write a letter to your friend and recommend a good place for a holiday that you have visited before. •	say where you went, •	where you stayed, •	what you can do there and •	what the food was like.
text: Hope you are fine. I’ve got your letter yesterday and I’m very glad to know that you are going on holiday. I’m writing to recommend a destination, where you should go for spending your holidays.
Last year, I went to Cape Town, which is the capital of South Africa. You will be glad to know that it’s one of the world’s beautiful country.

I stayed in a hotel, which name is the Lagoon Beach hotelhotel. This is located at the foot of Table Mountain and near the Lagoon beach. I loved the overall service and behaviour of the staff in this hotel. Even though this hotel is located at the centre of the town, the price is not expensive.

Honestly speaking, you will never be bored in this city. There are so many spectacular places, where you can visit. I visited Table Mountain, Golden Globe Theater, Royal Park, Cape Point, Nizumberg beach and Saint Plaza.
The varieties of food in that city really attracted me a lot. I loved to eat sea fishes, which are very much cheap compared to our country’s fishes.
I’m strongly recommending you to visit that country at least once in your life. I you have any other further question, please feel free to call me.
